attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please sign this petition to protest aginst animal cruelty and if you are evil and cold hearted enough not to care about the animals try putting yourself in there paws. imagine being beaten,burnt and left alone in the cold, selfish world with no food,water,shelter or company. i have seen so many animals like this been put to sleep because they have been in this misrey so long that our help can no longer hlp them.please, don't let cruelty get that far anymore.all animals need help and if you sigh this you can give it to them.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Anicruelty/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
